## Visualize Stability Scores
```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

stability_scores = [0.8, 0.8, 1.0, 0.8, 0.8, 1.0, 0.8]

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 5))
sns.barplot(x=list(range(1, len(stability_scores)+1)), y=stability_scores)
plt.xlabel("Perturbation Sample #")
plt.ylabel("Jaccard Similarity with Original Explanation")
plt.title("Stability of LIME Explanations under Perturbations")
plt.ylim(0, 1.05)
plt.show()
```
